casename: Excel Golf Pte Ltd v Allied Domecq Spirits & Wine (Singapore) Ltd
counsel: S H Almenoar and Raji Ramason (Tan Rajah & Cheah) for the appellants; Ang Cheng Hock (Allen & Gledhill) for the respondents
tags-parsed: Contract/Remedies/Apology/Whether party in breach of contract can be ordered to make public apology/Whether remedy sought available under the law/Whether court has power under para 14 of the First Schedule, Supreme Court of Judicature Act (Cap 322, 1999 Rev Ed) to order remedy of public apology
